summary:
I create a Dragon Priest summoner : what does it do ??? : really simple, you just have to type bat dp1 in your console and the first dragon priest will appear. 

You can summon all of them. The order goes like this dp1,dp2,dp3,dp4,dp5,dp6,dp6,dp7,dp8.


I add another option : It\'s summon all of them but, i warn you it\'s really really really
descriptionHtml:
I create a Dragon Priest summoner : what does it do ??? : really simple, you just have to type bat dp1 in your console and the first dragon priest will appear. 

You can summon all of them. The order goes like this dp1,dp2,dp3,dp4,dp5,dp6,dp6,dp7,dp8.


I add another option : It\'s summon all of them but, i warn you it\'s really really really hard to kill 

8 Dragon Priest at the same time.



How to install : Put the dp (It\'s mean Dragon Priest) files in your skyrim data folder (Not in the 

textures).


How to uninstall : Delete the dp files of your skyrim data folder
author: zoombir

files.name: Dragon Priest Summoner   -----one at a time-----
files.fileName: Dragon Priest Summoner   -----one at a time------5160-1.zip

files.name: Dragon Priest Summoner   -----all of them in one time-----
